item.title: New Englanders Know the Trump Tax Cuts Need to Be Extended
item.description: Higher taxes and fewer jobs are not a recipe for economic growth. New Englanders will get both if Congress fails to extend the TCJA.

item.title: Guess What? We’re Already Rich
item.description: Trump is using a defibrillator on a patient who not only passed a stress test with flying colors but is beating everyone else in the 100-yard dash.

item.title: Big Banks Are Not Bakers
item.description: When it comes to de-banking, the comparison of a bank’s activities to an artist’s free expression bounces like a bad check.

item.title: Temporary Tariff Exemptions Only Add to Trade-War Turmoil
item.description: Despite the pullback for electronics, the imposition of tariffs is far from over.

item.title: Raising Taxes Would Be a Historic Mistake
item.description: ‘Read my lips, no new taxes’ — the GOP should remember what happens when lawmakers break that pledge.
